author: IGN
description:
Watch the official trailer for Smurfs featuring the new song "Friend of Mine" by Rihanna.
When Papa Smurf (John Goodman) is mysteriously taken by evil wizards, Razamel and Gargamel, Smurfette (Rihanna) leads the Smurfs on a mission into the real world to save him. With the help of new friends, the Smurfs must discover what defines their destiny to save the universe. SMURFS features an all-star voice cast including Rihanna, James Corden, Nick Offerman, JP Karliak, Daniel Levy, Amy Sedaris, Natasha Lyonne, Sandra Oh, Octavia Spencer, Nick Kroll, Hannah Waddingham, Alex Winter, Maya Erskine, Billie Lourd, Xolo Maridueña, with Kurt Russell and John Goodman.
title: Smurfs - Official Trailer (2025) Rihanna, Nick Offerman, John Goodman

author: IGN
description: Watch the Enhanced Edition Trailer for Stalker: Clear Sky, the second entry in the first-person shooter survival franchise developed by GSC Game World. Players will follow the story's prequel, in which as Scar, players will fight through a war-raging Zone. Influence Faction Wars and shape the fragile alliances and rivalries that determine who survives the ever-shifting battle in this anomalous lands now fully transformed with enhanced lighting, godrays, screen space reflections, and global illumination. The Enhanced Edition for Stalker: Clear Sky is launching on May 20 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG).
title: Stalker: Clear Sky - Official Enhanced Edition Trailer

author: IGN
description: The legendary assassin turned convenience store owner is back! SAKAMOTO DAYS: Season 1 Part 2 hits Netflix on July 14, 2025! Expect bigger fights, more laughs, and unique characters that you’ll fall in love with.
title: Sakamoto Days Part 2 - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
The Midnight Walk reviewed by Will Borger on PlayStation 5, also available on PC.

The Midnight Walk is not long, but it is gorgeous and touching, and it took hold of me early and never let me go until I took the last step on my journey. It isn’t mechanically ambitious other than to play with perception in unexpected ways, and it challenged me to go into the dark unafraid, and find truth, and companionship, and I did.
title: The Midnight Walk Review

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the World Trailer for Blades of Fire, a third-person action RPG developed by MercurySteam. Players will embark on a vast journey through the scorched remains of Besacarr Hamlet to the frosty fortress of Winter's Wall. Take a look at a glimpse of the dynamic world of Blades of Fire, launching on May 22 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Epic Games Store) with a demo launching on May 15.
title: Blades of Fire - Official World Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Ready to hit the beach in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33? In this guide, we’ll show you how to unlock all 9 hidden swimsuits, from the early-game challenges to the secret romance rewards tied to Sciel. Most of them are tucked away across five hidden Gestral Beaches, each with its own mini-game – think parkour, volleyball, platforming, and more. The last two swimsuits are tied to Sciel’s romance path, so we’ll walk you through how to trigger those scenes, too.

Along the way, you’ll get tips on how to beat every mini-game, which abilities Esquie needs unlocked before you go hunting, and a few tricks to make the tougher challenges way easier. Whether you’re in it for the fashion or just want 100% completion, this guide has you covered.

Looking for a full Sciel romance guide? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6XRgynArlzQ

00:00 - Intro
00:44 - Gestral Beach 1 – Parkour Challenge
01:59 - Gestral Beach 2 – Raft Volleyball
03:06 - Gestral Beach 3 – “Only Up” Climb
03:44 - Gestral Beach 4 – Time
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - All 9 Hidden Swimsuits | Every Gestral Beach Location

author: IGN
description: Check out the Enhanced Edition Trailer for Stalker: Shadow of Chornobyl, the first entry in the first-person shooter survival franchise developed by GSC Game World. Players will follow the story of Marked One through a twisted landscape of radiation, anomalies, and rival stalkers with enhanced and upscaled visuals. The Enhanced Edition for Stalker: Shadow of Chornobyl is launching on May 20 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG).
title: Stalker: Shadow of Chornobyl - Official Enhanced Edition Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Doom: The Dark Ages puts a ton of fun gear in your hands, and all of your guns, melee weapons, and spiky new shield can be upgraded as you collect special resources. There are lots of choices in where to spend your Gold, Rubies, and Wraithstones, so let us give you a few recommendations. We’re going to focus on some particular weapons to get the most bang for your buck, and you’ll be able to get everything on our list by the game’s halfway point.

0:00 - Intro
--- Gold Upgrades ---
0:43 - Retaliation - Shield
0:59 - Incendiary - Combat Shotgun
1:18 - Pincushion - Shredder
2:13 - Conditioning - Flail
2:33 - Cannibalism - Rocket Launcher
--- Ruby Upgrades ---
3:14 - Tune Up - Combat Shotgun
4:05 - No Frills - Shredder
4:22 - Blade Master - Shield
--- Wraithstone Upgrades ---
5:02 - Bloodlust - Rocket Launcher
5:26 - Eat This! - Combat Shotgun / Super Shotgun
title: Doom: The Dark Ages - BEST Weapon Upgrades to Get First

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'A Minecraft Movie' DLC Launch Trailer for Minecraft, the hit creation adventure game developed by Mojang. Players will now be able to access specific content from the movie, including skins, events, and more, for players to enjoy. The 'A Minecraft Movie' DLC is available now for Minecraft.

#Minecraft #AMinecraftMovie #Gaming
title: Minecraft - Official 'A Minecraft Movie' DLC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Andor Season 2, Episodes 10-12, reviewed by Clint Gage.

Andor concludes its second season (and its entire run) by sharpening its focus on the little guys, giving nearly everybody but the title character a satisfying sendoff. It manages to clear every hurdle a prequel series might encounter except for the last one, leaving the bulk of its “ending” up to Rogue One – but even that feels appropriate in its own way. Like the Rebels who fought and died for the cause only to be forgotten about, Andor deserves to be remembered as some of the best Star Wars ever had to offer.
title: Andor Series Finale Review

author: IGN
description:
Check out episode 1 of LAST SENTINEL's Developer Diary series! This is an inside-look at Lightspeed L.A. during the development of LAST SENTINEL, their narrative focused open-world action game set in reconstructed Tokyo.


Presented by LAST SENTINEL
title: Last Sentinel - Developer Diary Episode 1

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for Superman, the upcoming DCU film distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures.


Superman stars David Corenswet in the dual role as Superman/Clark Kent, Rachel Brosnahan as Lois Lane, and Nicholas Hoult as Lex Luthor. The film also stars Skyler Gisondo as Jimmy Olsen, Edi Gathegi, Anthony Carrigan, Nathan Fillion, Isabela Merced, Sara Sampaio, Maria Gabriela de Faria, Wendell Pierce, Alan Tudyk, Pruitt Taylor Vince, Neva Howell, Beck Bennett as Steve Lombard, Mikaela Hoover as Cat Grant, and Christopher McDonald as Ron Troupe. 


Superman is executive produced by Nikolas Korda, Chantal Nong Vo and Lars Winther. Behind the camera, Gunn is joined by frequent collaborators, including director of photography Henry Braham, production designer Beth Mickle, costume designer Judianna Makovsky and composer John Murphy, along with editors Craig Alpert (“Deadpool 2,” “Blue Beetle”), Jason Ballantine (the “IT” films, “The Flash”) and William Hoy (“The Batman”).


Superman op
title: Superman - Official Trailer (2025) David Corenswet, Rachel Brosnahan, Nicholas Hoult

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Exclusive Launch Trailer for Cubic Odyssey, an open-world survival crafting action-adventure game developed by Atypical Games. Players will explore a variety of vast planets with vibrant colors to craft tools, build vehicles, and fight against the Red Darkness. Uncover long-dormant secrets, explore the heavens, and shape a universe to the exact desired specifications. Cubic Odyssey is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#CubicOdyssey #Gaming #IGN
title: Cubic Odyssey - Exclusive Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get a detailed look at how you should expect the world of Limveld to change from run to run (including the things that won't change) in Elden Ring Nightreign, the upcoming Elden Ring roguelike from From Software.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign: How Limveld Will Change From Run to Run – IGN First

author: IGN
description: House Flipper: Remastered Collection rolls every DLC (including the HGTV and Apocalypse DLCs that hadn't yet been released on consoles) into one package for the home-remodeling sim. It also adds better lighting and graphics, an improved save system, six new jobs and houses, new mechanics and quality-of-life improvements, and more. It'll be released on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S this Winter. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3710840/
title: House Flipper: Remastered Collection – Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Definitive Edition Launch Trailer for Mortal Kombat 1, the ultimate version of the latest entry in the legendary fighting game series developed by NetherRealm. Players can now access a new version of Mortal Kombat fitted with the base game, the Kombat Pack, and the Khaos Reigns Kombat 2 Pack, containing characters such as Homelander, Omni-Man, Peacekeeper, and more. Mortal Kombat 1: Definitive Edition is also packed with new skins from the Mortal Kombat film as well. Mortal Kombat 1: Definitive Edition is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#MortalKombat1 #Gaming #IGN
title: Mortal Kombat 1 - Official Definitive Edition Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the New Wave Pack DLC 1 Trailer for WWE 2K25, the latest addition to the wrestling game franchise developed by Visual Concepts. Players can now access the New Wave Pack fitted with Chris Sabin, Alex Shelley, Giulia, Stephanie, Vaquer, alongside a special celebrity guest to be announced. The DLC is also packed with over 40 new moves and taunts coming with the New Wave Pack DLC 1, available now for WWE 2K25 on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#WWE2K25 #NewWavePackDLC #Gaming
title: WWE 2K25 - Official New Wave Pack DLC 1 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Enhanced Edition Announcement Trailer for Stalker: Legends of the Zone, the trilogy that started it all for the first-person survival-based shooters developed by GSC Game World. Players will soon be able to access the trilogy of games in the Stalker franchise, fully enhanced with refined visuals for the latest generation of hardware. Stalker: Legends of the Zone is fitted with Shadow of Chornobyl (2007), Clear Sky (2008), and Call of Prypiat (2009), each with an overhaul with upgraded visuals, next-gen console optimizations, and expanded mod support. Stalker: Legends of the Zone is launching on May 20 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG).

#StalkerLegendsOfTheZone #Gaming #IGN
title: Stalker: Legends of the Zone - Official Enhanced Edition Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for Marvel Television’s Ironheart, the latest live-action Disney Plus streaming series as part of the MCU distributed by Marvel Studios. Marvel Television's Ironheart is releasing a 3-episode premiere on June 24 exclusively on Disney Plus.

Genius teenage inventor Riri Williams creates the most advanced suit of armor since Iron Man. The story of the series follows the journey of Riri Williams days after her introduction in Black Panther: Wakanda Forever as she rises to the occasion to become Ironheart. She will face many friendly faces in her corner alongside adversaries such as The Hood.

Ironheart stars Dominique Throne, Anthony Ramos, Alden Ehrenreich, Manny Montana, Zoe Terakes, Lyric Ross, and more. The series is created by Chinaka Hodge alongside being executive produced by Ryan Coogler, Brad Winderbaum, and Zoie Nagelhout.

Marvel Television's Ironheart is releasing a 3-episode premiere on June 24 exclusively on Disney Plus.

#Ironheart #Marvel #IGN
title: Marvel Television's Ironheart - Official Trailer (2025) Dominique Throne, Anthony Ramos

author: IGN
description: Remedy’s first foray into multiplayer is as silly as you’d hope. Here's our preview after playing two hours of FBC: Firebreak, an online co-op shooter spin-off of Control.
title: FBC: Firebreak is The Weirdest Shooter You’ll Play All Year

author: IGN
description:
Yasha: Legends of the Demon Blade reviewed by Jarrett Green on PC, also available on PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, and Xbox Series X|S.

Yasha: Legends of the Demon Blade can be fun for a bit, but with repetitive levels that lack a significant challenge for most of the three campaigns, it doesn’t stay that way for long. Though its quick and basic combat is solid, the potential of its diverse weapon selection to bring variety and nuance to battle is undermined by how easy so much of it is without really investing in them at all. Not to mention you’ll see all there is to see, enemy and level-wise, by the end of the first chapter of the first character you choose. And when its stories fail to do much more than provide a flimsy bridge to the next group of baddies to kill, you might be convinced pretty quickly to let sleeping legends lie.
title: Yasha: Legends of the Demon Blade Review
